Name: Between Decks
Ingredients: 7.5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
Instructions: BLEND all ingredients with ½ scoop crushed ice.
Review: Gin and juice served 'frozen' with cranberry adding berry complexity and tart lime maintaining balance.
History: Adapted from a recipe in Victor Bergeron 's 1972 Trader Vic's Bartender's Guide .
Nutrition: One serving of Between Decks contains 190 calories
Garnish: Mint sprigs bouquet and fruit stick (skewered pineapple cubes and
